attributes.action: Ask David Cameron to step down as Prime Minister.
attributes.background: David Cameron is a hypocrite. He has lied to the British people about his financial affairs and his position has become untenable. He has no idea how most of the people he is meant to serve struggle to live day by day. He must step down from office immediately.

rejection.details: The resignation of the Prime Minister is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.
